content.html: Dreams is out now! For the first time in a long time I finally feel creatively free and excited about the music making process again and am so proud and excited for this new era of music. Hope you all enjoy Dreams and this next chapter from me❤️ bit.ly/Gryffin-Dreams… twitter.com/i/web/status/1…
content.value:
Dreams is out now!

For the first time in a long time I finally feel creatively free and excited about the music making process again and am so proud and excited for this new era of music.  Hope you all enjoy Dreams and this next chapter from me❤️ bit.ly/Gryffin-Dreams… twitter.com/i/web/status/1…
